de.amr.plt.rcTestapp

Class MapView

  • java.lang.Object
    • SurfaceView
      • de.amr.plt.rcTestapp.MapView

  • public class MapView
extends SurfaceView
    This class offers functionality as a Surface View. It can therefore be used to implement a dedicated drawing surface within the View hierarchy, to display related map information about the NXT robot.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Daniel Wohllebe

      • setParkingSlot

        public void setParkingSlot(IAndroidHmi.ParkingSlot ps,
                  int index)
        Sets a ParkingSlot at a certain index. The ParkingSlot is masked with a copy of all available ParkingSlots and, if successful, is pushed to the thread.
        Parameters:
        ps -
        index -

      • propagateParkingSlots

        public void propagateParkingSlots()
        Deprecated. 
        Pushes all Parking slots to the draw thread and clears the list of Parking slots. Only does so, if the list as changed. Since ParkingSlots are now set directly, this method has no effect anymore

      • getParkingSlotSelectionID

        public int getParkingSlotSelectionID()
        Returns the currently selected ParkingSlots' index number.
        Returns:
        ParkingSlotID
